title: Auth0 MailChimp Export for DSP
name: dotstudiopro-auth0-mailchimp-export
author: dotstudioPRO
description: Allows Auth0 Customers to synchronize their Auth0 User base (those that have an email) with a MailChimp List

DSP_COMPANY_ARRAY.description: This is a comma-separated string with company ids, ex. 1, 2, 3, 4

AUTH0_CONNECTION_NAME.description: This is the Auth0 Connection name associated with the user profiles you wish to export
